content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Gabriel Knight - Sins of the Fathers 20th Anniversary Edition/GK1.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:

    name: create_prefix

- task:

    name: wineexec
